attempts.prompt: First, the exact character from Image 1, preserving identical facial features and proportions, sits at the workbench, hand frozen on the radio dial, eyes wide, mouth slightly open, stunned by what comes from the speaker. Then, the exact character from Image 2, preserving identical facial features, sits beside, leaning forward with intense focus, not breathing. Then, the exact character from Image 3, preserving identical facial features, stands motionless in the background holding a stick, frozen mid-motion. Use Image 4 as the exact background location. Medium-wide shot, eye-level. Dim garage light, the radio as focal point. No text, no watermarks. 3D Pixar-style, family-friendly, cinematic. Use Image 5 as reference for the exact room layout, furniture placement, and all visible objects.
attempts.prompt_b: First, the exact character from Image 1, preserving identical facial features and proportions, grips the radio dial with one hand, face frozen in concentration, eyes locked on the radio speaker. Then, the exact character from Image 2, preserving identical facial features, leans in with parted lips, captivated. Then, the exact character from Image 3, preserving identical facial features, stands behind, object dangling forgotten from one hand, staring. Use Image 4 as the exact background location. Medium shot, slight low angle. Moody garage lighting, dramatic shadow from single overhead source. No text, no watermarks. 3D Pixar-style, family-friendly, cinematic. Use Image 5 as reference for the exact room layout, furniture placement, and all visible objects.
